participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: warm and nurturing, loves to share stories about family and enjoys crafting.
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: enthusiastic and adventurous, enjoys exploring new ideas and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: i just bought a house recently. i eat a raw diet. i see the rolling stones in concert every year. i am married with two kids. i am an economics major.
